channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item
item.description: SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice_Item Service Datatype Description Each billing invoice item makes up a record within an invoice. This provides you with a detailed record of everything related to an invoice item. When you are billed, our system takes active billing items and creates an invoice. These invoice items are a copy of your active billing items, and make up the contents of your invoice. Local associatedInvoiceItemId The associated invoice Item ID.
